title: Old Q vanished, Looking for Information
body: So I have been enjoying the changes to Rengar Q on PBE thought things were going good, when I got home from school I went to go check on my precious knife cat when i noticed that the Q has vanished and went back to the old swimming technique. I just want to know why i'm not here to complain or give my opinions just want to know why they would take it back or if this is just a bug that is getting fixed. As of right now the servers are down for maintenance and i'm hoping that this is just a mistake.

replies.body:
Rengar changes will come in 8.4, including Q as an on next hit again.

PBE is currently testing 8.3 changes only for a few more days until that patch goes out.

Hi, I know this isnt related, but I'd like to see your opinion on this "theorycrafting" I had regarding Press The Attack, because its currently underwhelming compared to Fleet Footwork, same goes for Lethal Tempo.

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/rNqHxx0a-press-the-attack-suggestion
ok cool btw what was the general opinion on rengar during pbe to strong or like looking pretty good?

I suggest reading posts by Surrender at 20 as they keep everyone up to date on PBE changes.
It was shown he got reverted for now to live and will be returning next patch.
http://www.surrenderat20.net/
